entry.title: Pound Bag 15LB Clear - 12" x 3" x 20" (200-Pack)
entry.summary:
Vendor: POLYKAR
Type: poly bag
Price: 15.86

Our selection of poly bags are made from strong and durable 100% LDPE Low Density Polyethylene and are CFIA approved for use in the food industry, they are transparent with superior clarity for visible storage and protection in uses such as food processing and service, chemical processing, laboratory work and manufacturing.

Qty/pack 200
Volume 25lb
Dimensions 12" L x 6" I x 30" H
